A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is honestly one of the worst star wars ever made. I still think Phantom Menace was the worst\, just because the hype for a new star wars movie after 15 years of hiatus led to extremely high expectations\, and the let down of Phantom Menace was unforgettable\, unforgivable\, and ultimately what cost Lucas his franchise. The Last Jedi was probably the 2nd worst in my opinion. The dialogue is horrid\, and it makes good actors struggle\, and bad actors unbearable to watch. There were a few laughable moments\, but mostly I found myself laughing at the ridiculousness of it all! Rian Johnson and the rest should be sh*t canned\, just like this movie.
